channel.title: DeluxeRevolution alot of fun!
channel.description:
This is a fun and great server to hang out and meet some new people. There are penguins that drop rares and goblins that drop crystal keys and the crystal keys are used for the chest to get good items. Also we are looking for some people for staff but no stuff hunters. The owners are Evo and Owner ty. Main owner is Evo.
Website: http://deluxerevolution.webs.com
Play Now: http://deluxerevolution.webs.com/webclient
Forums: http://deluxerevolution.webs.com/apps/forums/
Home: Talk to people [img]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/9857/icj.PNG[/img]
Goblins: Drops Ckeys for the chest [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/9631/8a8x.png[/img]
Penguins: Drops some rares [img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/2223/4mek.png[/img]
